_header: This night I will wend my way tide that betide
_description: A charm against thieves by the four Apostles — in couplets

BLSl2584.First Lines: This nyȝt I wil wende my wey tide what bytideIf any þeues hider come here þei schal abyde…
BLSl2584.Last Lines: …Stondeþ þeues stondeþ þeues in þe vertu of þe trinyte& for þe passioun of Ihesu crist & of his deþ & his vpristStylle þat ȝe stonde til I bydde ȝow gane
BLSl2584.Note: Three couplets and three unrhymed lines followed by Latin “In nomine Ihesu fiat fiat Amen.”
